mapper.select: /** package kr.or.ddit.board.pro_story.mapper.ProStoryMapper storyList 프로스토리 리스트 */ SELECT PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_NO , PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_SJ , TO_CHAR(PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_WR_DT , 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_WR_DT , PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_RECOMMEND , PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_RDCNT , PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_THUMB_PHOTO , PRO_ID FROM PRO_STORY_BBSCTT ORDER BY PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_NO

/** package kr.or.ddit.board.pro_story.mapper.ProStoryMapper getStory 프로스토리 특정글 */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_WR_DT DESC) AS ROW_NUM , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_NO AS proStoryBbscttNo , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_SJ AS proStoryBbscttSj , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_CN AS proStoryBbscttCn , TO_CHAR(A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_WR_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS proStoryBbscttWrDt , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_RECOMMEND AS proStoryBbscttRecommend , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_RDCNT AS proStoryBbscttRdcnt , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_THUMB_PHOTO AS proStoryBbscttThumbPhoto , A.PRO_ID AS proId , B.USER_ID AS userId , B.USER_NM AS userNm , B.SECSN_AT AS secsnAt , B.EMPLYR_TY AS emplyrTy , B.USER_NCNM AS userNcnm , C.PRO_MBTLNUM AS proMbtlnum , C.SEXDSTN_TY AS sexdstnTy , C.EMAIL AS email , C.PRO_PROFL_PHOTO AS proProflPhoto , D.SPCLTY_REALM_CODE AS spcltyRealmCode , D.SPCLTY_REALM_NM AS spcltyRealmNm , D.PTPRT_SPCLTY_REALM_CODE AS spcltyRealmCodeBase FROM PRO_STORY_BBSCTT A , USERS B , PRO C , SPCLTY_REALM D WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRO_ID = B.USER_ID AND C.PRO_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.PRO_ID = C.PRO_ID AND C.SPCLTY_REALM_CODE = D.SPCLTY_REALM_CODE AND PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_NO = #{proStoryBbscttNo}

/** package kr.or.ddit.board.pro_story.mapper.ProStoryMapper getPage 프로스토리 페이징 */ SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_WR_DT DESC) AS ROW_NUM , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_NO AS proStoryBbscttNo , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_SJ AS proStoryBbscttSj , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_CN AS proStoryBbscttCn , TO_CHAR(A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_WR_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS proStoryBbscttWrDt , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_RECOMMEND AS proStoryBbscttRecommend , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_RDCNT AS proStoryBbscttRdcnt , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_THUMB_PHOTO AS proStoryBbscttThumbPhoto , A.PRO_ID AS proId , B.USER_ID AS userId , B.USER_NM AS userNm , B.EMPLYR_TY AS emplyrTy , B.SECSN_AT AS secsnAt , B.USER_NCNM AS userNcnm , C.PRO_MBTLNUM AS proMbtlnum , C.SEXDSTN_TY AS sexdstnTy , C.EMAIL AS email , C.PRO_PROFL_PHOTO AS proProflPhoto , C.SPCLTY_REALM_CODE AS spcltyRealmCode FROM PRO_STORY_BBSCTT A , USERS B , PRO C WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRO_ID = B.USER_ID AND C.PRO_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.PRO_ID = C.PRO_ID
) T WHERE T.ROW_NUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * 8) - (8 - 1) AND (#{currentPage} * 8)

mapper.select:
/** package kr.or.ddit.board.pro_story.mapper.ProStoryMapper getWeekRecommend 최근 일주일 내 추천수 상위 4개 가져오기 */
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_NO , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_SJ , TO_CHAR(A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_WR_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_RECOMMEND , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_RDCNT , A.PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_THUMB_PHOTO , A.SPRVISE_ATCHMNFL_NO , A.PRO_ID , B.USER_NM , B.USER_NCNM FROM PRO_STORY_BBSCTT A , USERS B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRO_ID = B.USER_ID AND PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_WR_DT >= SYSDATE - 7 ORDER BY PRO_STORY_BBSCTT_RECOMMEND DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

/** package kr.or.ddit.board.pro_story.mapper.ProStoryMapper getTotalPages 토탈글수 */
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM PRO_STORY_BBSCTT
WHERE 1 = 1
